title: Auto Fill
body:
I've made a post about this before, but I just thought i'd add another in the spirit of Auto Fill being detrimental. Despite all the problems with people not knowing roles they're filled in and trolling/throwing games etc.. We could argue that till the cows come home.

I've sat here now through 9 queue dodges. about 25 minutes.

Why not just turn it damn off and we can wait 25 minutes for a real queue pop?

replies.body: so, in seasons past, you had to know at least how to play every role in the game to some degree, rather than being able to lock in two roles and expecting to get them.
